panels.title: Start Real-Time Data Fetching
panels.content:
# Control Panel

**Start Data Fetching:** [ðŸš€ Start Real-Time Fetch](http://localhost:8000/start-realtime-fetch?exchanges=${exchanges:csv}&symbols=${symbols:csv}&duration_minutes=60&grafana_base_url=http://localhost:3000&dashboard_uid=crypto-arbitrage)

**Stop Data Fetching:** [ðŸ›‘ Stop All Fetchers](http://localhost:8000/stop-realtime-fetch)

**Current Selection:** Exchanges: `${exchanges}` | Symbols: `${symbols}`

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  detection_timestamp as 'Detection Time',
  symbol as 'Symbol',
  buy_exchange as 'Buy Exchange',
  sell_exchange as 'Sell Exchange',
  ROUND(buy_price, 4) as 'Buy Price',
  ROUND(sell_price, 4) as 'Sell Price',
  ROUND(gross_profit_percentage, 2) as 'Gross Profit %',
  ROUND(net_profit_percentage, 2) as 'Net Profit %',
  ROUND(net_profit_usd, 2) as 'Net Profit USD',
  ROUND(volume_constraint, 2) as 'Max Volume',
  risk_level as 'Risk'
FROM arbitrage_opportunities 
WHERE detection_timestamp >= $__timeFrom() 
  AND detection_timestamp <= $__timeTo()
  AND symbol IN (${symbols:sqlstring})
  AND (buy_exchange IN (${exchanges:sqlstring}) OR sell_exchange IN (${exchanges:sqlstring}))
  AND net_profit_percentage > 0.1
ORDER BY detection_timestamp DESC, net_profit_percentage DESC
LIMIT 50

SELECT 
  timestamp as time,
  CONCAT(exchange, ' - ', symbol) as metric,
  spread_percentage as value
FROM exchange_data 
WHERE timestamp >= $__timeFrom() 
  AND timestamp <= $__timeTo()
  AND symbol IN (${symbols:sqlstring})
  AND exchange IN (${exchanges:sqlstring})
  AND spread_percentage IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT 
  timestamp as time,
  'Safe Gas Price' as metric,
  safe_gas_price as value
FROM blockchain_data 
WHERE timestamp >= $__timeFrom() 
  AND timestamp <= $__timeTo()
  AND data_type = 'gas_prices'
  AND safe_gas_price IS NOT NULL

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  timestamp as time,
  'Fast Gas Price' as metric,
  fast_gas_price as value
FROM blockchain_data 
WHERE timestamp >= $__timeFrom() 
  AND timestamp <= $__timeTo()
  AND data_type = 'gas_prices'
  AND fast_gas_price IS NOT NULL

ORDER BY time

SELECT 
  net_profit_percentage as value
FROM arbitrage_opportunities 
WHERE detection_timestamp >= $__timeFrom() 
  AND detection_timestamp <= $__timeTo()
  AND symbol IN (${symbols:sqlstring})
  AND (buy_exchange IN (${exchanges:sqlstring}) OR sell_exchange IN (${exchanges:sqlstring}))
  AND net_profit_percentage > 0

SELECT 
  'Block Number' as metric,
  MAX(block_number) as value
FROM blockchain_data 
WHERE timestamp >= $__timeFrom() 
  AND data_type = 'latest_block'

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'Gas Usage %' as metric,
  AVG(gas_usage_percentage) as value
FROM blockchain_data 
WHERE timestamp >= $__timeFrom() 
  AND data_type = 'network_metrics'
  AND gas_usage_percentage IS NOT NULL

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'Avg Gas Price' as metric,
  AVG(avg_gas_price) as value
FROM blockchain_data 
WHERE timestamp >= $__timeFrom() 
  AND data_type = 'tx_statistics'
  AND avg_gas_price IS NOT NULL
